summary: This is an FBI criminal history record (rap sheet) for Ryan David Dionne, produced in response to a request. It details his identification information and multiple arrests in New Hampshire from 1998 to 2019 for charges including falsification, resisting arrest/detention, trespassing, stalking, and criminal contempt.

events.title: Arrest for Unsworn Falsification and Resisting Detention
events.description: Ryan D Dionne was arrested by the Dover Police Department for unsworn falsification and by the New Hampshire State Police for resisting detention.

events.title: Arrest for Resisting Arrest and Criminal Trespass
events.description: Ryan D Dionne was arrested by the Farmington Police Department for resisting arrest/detention and criminal trespass.

events.title: Arrest for Stalking and Criminal Contempt
events.description: Ryan D Dionne was arrested by the Rochester Police Department for stalking and criminal contempt.

locations: Alfred E. Smith Building, 80 South Swan St., Albany, New York 12210
keyFacts: The document is an official FBI criminal history record (rap sheet) for Ryan D Dionne, FBI number 827028HB1.
Ryan D Dionne has multiple arrests in New Hampshire from 1998 to 2019, with charges including unsworn falsification, resisting arrest/detention, criminal trespass, stalking, and criminal contempt.
The record indicates a DNA indicator stating 'DNA NOT IN CODIS - COLLECT DNA' as of December 12, 2021.
The subject's physical description is provided: male, white, 6'1", 178 lbs, brown hair, blue eyes, with a scar on the chin and a tattoo on the right arm, born in New Hampshire.
